data.current_description: Send a message to specified target (a registration token, topic or condition).
data.summary_suggestion: Send a Firebase Cloud Messaging message to target
data.description_suggestion: Sends a message via Firebase Cloud Messaging to a specified target recipient. Accepts a SendMessageRequest containing a Message object and target specification (registration token, topic subscription, or condition). The target determines delivery: registration tokens deliver to individual devices, topics enable broadcast messaging to subscribed devices, and conditions allow complex targeting logic. Returns a message ID upon successful send. The operation requires OAuth 2.0 authentication and will validate the message format and target before delivery.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks critical details for AI agent decision-making. Missing: (1) summary entirely - needed for quick operation identification, (2) input details about SendMessageRequest structure and target types, (3) output details about the returned message ID, (4) side effects of message delivery, (5) authentication requirements. Enhanced version provides complete context about target types (registration token, topic, condition), expected inputs/outputs, and authentication, enabling AI agents to determine when this operation is appropriate and how to use it correctly.
